attributes.action: EQUALITY IN RAIL FARES FOR YOUNG PEOPLE
attributes.additional_details: Voting,smoking,drinking,loans and various other activities can only be done when you are 18 so why charge our young people full adult fares
attributes.background: at present young people have to pay full adult fare at 16 that might of been ok when you could leave school and get a job but now young people are in education until 18 .
